byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The brokerage firm BGC Partners said it had acquired Excess Space Retail Services, a specialist in helping companies get rid of their unused space.

headline.main: BGC Partners Continues Spree With Deal to Buy Real Estate Firm

snippet: The brokerage firm BGC Partners said it had acquired Excess Space Retail Services, a specialist in helping companies get rid of their unused space.
abstract: DealBook Online; BGC Partners says it has bought Excess Space Retail Services.
